statements: SELECT * FROM employee_schedule WHERE schedule_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT employee_id, start_time, end_time FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 1001
SELECT employee_id, pay_date, total_pay FROM payroll WHERE employee_id = 2001
SELECT * FROM payroll WHERE hours_worked > 40
SELECT employee_id, pay_date, total_pay FROM payroll ORDER BY total_pay DESC
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule;
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM employee_schedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked FROM payroll GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT employee_id, pay_date, total_pay FROM payroll WHERE total_pay >= 1000 ORDER BY pay_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedules WHERE employee_id = 101
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date FROM employee_schedules ORDER BY schedule_date DESC
SELECT * FROM employee_schedules WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-05-31'
SELECT employee_id, salary FROM payroll WHERE salary > 50000
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM employee_schedules WHERE employee_id = 102
SELECT * FROM employee_schedules WHERE employee_id = 1
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date FROM employee_schedules WHERE schedule_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM payroll WHERE salary > 5000 ORDER BY salary DESC
SELECT * FROM payroll JOIN employee_schedules ON payroll.employee_id = employee_schedules.employee_id
SELECT employee_id, payment_date FROM payroll WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_name, job_title FROM Employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT * FROM Payroll ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT shift_description, start_time, end_time FROM Shifts WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, payment_amount FROM Employees JOIN Payroll ON Employees.employee_id = Payroll.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_name, job_title FROM Employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT * FROM Shifts ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT employee_name, payment_amount FROM Employees INNER JOIN Payroll ON Employees.employee_id = Payroll.employee_id WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT department, COUNT(*) as total_employees FROM Employees GROUP BY department;
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM Shift WHERE shift_type = 'Morning' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT employee_id, name FROM Employee WHERE department = 'Engineering' AND role = 'Developer';
SELECT payroll_id, payment_amount, pay_date FROM Payroll WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id, name FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT name, department FROM Employee WHERE role = 'Supervisor';
SELECT shift_type, start_time, end_time FROM Shift ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT e.name, s.start_time, s.end_time, p.payment_amount FROM Employee e JOIN Shift s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id JOIN Payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, position FROM employees ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, position, department FROM employees WHERE position='Manager';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM schedules;
SELECT employee_id, name, position FROM employees WHERE department='Engineering';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT name, position FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT e.name, d.name AS department_name FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.department = d.department_id WHERE d.manager_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT e.name, p.salary FROM employees e JOIN payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id WHERE p.salary > 50000;
SELECT e.name, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM employees e JOIN schedules sc ON e.employee_id = sc.employee_id JOIN shifts s ON sc.schedule_id = s.schedule_id WHERE s.start_time > '2022-01-01';
